name: update
description: Universal package manager updater with granular source control

args.name: -Sources
args.description: Specify which package managers to update (Winget, Scoop, Choco, NPM, Go, Cargo, Pip, Gem)

args.name: -CheckOnly
args.description: Only check for updates, don't install them

args.name: -Comparison
args.description: Show detailed comparison of available vs current versions

args.name: -Force
args.description: Force updates even if no updates detected
